title: Somewhere in Time
description: Richard Collier, a man of the modern era, becomes obsessed with a woman of another time, a celebrated actress at the turn of the century. His fascination with Elise McKenna proves strong enough to physically transport him back to 1896, where he meets and woos the woman of his dreams. But for how long can their passion resist the relentless tide of history?The World Fantasy Award-winning novel that inspired the beloved film starring Christopher Reeve and Jane Seymour, by the best-selling author of WHAT DREAMS MAY COME.Cover Photograph by Dana Neibert
author: Richard Matheson
